deal.product_description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch Ultra is a premium 47mm LTE Titanium smartwatch designed for both style and functionality. It features a circular display made with durable materials suitable for outdoor activities, providing GPS tracking, health monitoring, and custom apps for various needs. The robust design integrates a range of smart features including notifications, music control, and heart rate tracking, making it an ideal companion for fitness enthusiasts and tech-savvy users alike.

The Refurbished Unlocked Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max offers an impressive 256GB storage and a huge display, perfect for both media consumption and productivity. Enjoy advanced camera technology for stunning photos. This model is designed to provide a seamless user experience with 5G capabilities for faster downloads and streaming. Refurbished to high standards, it comes in various colors and can support all the latest apps from the App Store, accommodating any Apple enthusiast's needs.

The Pioneer 50" Class LED 4K UHD Smart Xumo TV boasts an impressive 3840x2160 resolution with HDR 10, ensuring crisp and vibrant visuals. This TV is equipped with three HDMI ports and one USB port, providing versatile connectivity options for all your devices. The Smart Xumo functionalities allow for easy access to a wide range of streaming services, enhancing your viewing experience. With its sleek design and cutting-edge technology, this television is an excellent addition to any home entertainment setup.

Experience immersive viewing with the Certified Refurb Sony X90L Series XR65X90L 65" 4K HDR LED UHD Smart TV. This model features advanced 3840x2160 (4K) resolution, HDR 10 support, and a smooth 120Hz refresh rate, making it perfect for enjoying your favorite movies and shows in stunning detail and clarity. It's Google TV compatible and integrates seamlessly with both Alexa and Google Assistant for voice control. With four HDMI ports, it's designed to accommodate all your devices.

The Birdfy Smart Bird Feeder combines innovative technology with eco-friendly wood, featuring a camera that can identify over 6000 bird species using AI. Equipped with a solar panel for sustainable powering, this feeder allows bird lovers to capture detailed footage in 1080P HD, even at night. It connects easily to 2.4GHz Wi-Fi routers for remote monitoring.

The Certified Refurb Dyson V11 Animal + Cordless Vacuum is designed for maximum cleaning efficiency with its powerful suction and versatile attachments. Included are a filter, extension wand, floor brush, charger, and crevice tool, making it suitable for various cleaning tasks around the home. Compact and cordless, it's perfect for every home environment to effectively tackle dirt and pet hair.

The certified refurbished iRobot Roomba j7+ offers advanced cleaning technology with smart mapping features and a self-emptying base that simplifies maintenance. This robot vacuum includes a self-cleaning cartridge filter that ensures efficient dirt and debris collection. It is designed to handle various floor types while providing the convenience of smart home integration. With a 2-year Allstate warranty, it promises reliability and performance at an excellent price.

The 6.5 cu. ft. Fireproof Dual Key Smart Lock Safe is designed to provide maximum security for your essential documents and valuables. Weighing 88 lbs., this safe not only protects against unauthorized access with dual key locks but is also fireproof to secure your items in case of emergencies. It's perfect for homeowners looking to safeguard their important belongings while providing ample space to organize them.

The Motorola Moto G Play is a versatile Android phone equipped with 64GB of storage and features a vibrant 6.5-inch HD+ display. Powered by a long-lasting 5,000mAh battery, it ensures extended usage without frequent charging. With its impressive 50MP camera utilizing Quad Pixel technology, you can capture stunning images, making it a great choice for photography enthusiasts. In addition, it supports expandable storage up to 1TB, providing ample space for apps, photos, and media.

The Refurb Apple iPad 10.2" (2020) tablet is equipped with an A12 Bionic chip and a stunning 10.2" Retina display that supports the Apple Pencil (1st generation) and Smart Keyboard. With features like an 8MP back camera and a 1.2MP front camera, this tablet is perfect for multitasking and entertainment. It also includes a 2-year Allstate warranty, ensuring peace of mind in your purchase.
